Properties.ProtectedString:
--------------------------------------------------- -- Tool Variables -- --------------------------------------------------- local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local Humanoid = nil local ServerScript = Tool:WaitForChild('SoSScript') local AbilityRemoteEvent = ServerScript:WaitForChild('AbilityRemoteEvent') local EquipAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('EquipAnim') local SpinAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('SpinAnim') local UpSmashAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('UpSmashAnim') local DownSmashAnim = Tool:WaitForChild('DownSmashAnim') local AnimValue = Tool:WaitForChild('Anim') local SoSGui = Tool:WaitForChild('SoSGui')
-- Animations local SwingAnims = { [1] = Tool:WaitForChild('OverheadSwingAnim'), [2] = Tool:WaitForChild('SlashAnim') }
--Sounds local EquipSound = Handle:WaitForChild('EquipSound')
--------------------------------------------------- -- Constants -- --------------------------------------------------- local SWING_DEBOUNCE = 0.9 local SWING_SPEED = 1.5 local SPIN_ATTACK_TIME = 2
--------------------------------------------------- -- Events -- --------------------------------------------------- local function onAnimChanged(val) if val == '' then return end
local anim = nil if Tool.Parent then local character = Tool.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then if val == 'SpinAnim' then anim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(SpinAnim) anim:Play(nil, nil, 1.75) wait(SPIN_ATTACK_TIME) anim:Stop() elseif val == 'UpSmashAnim' then anim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(UpSmashAnim) anim:Play() wait(0.7) anim:Stop() anim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(DownSmashAnim) anim:Play() wait(0.325) anim:Stop() elseif val == 'SwingAnim' then anim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(SwingAnims[math.random(1, #SwingAnims)]) if anim then anim:Play() end end end AnimValue.Value = '' end end
local function onKeyDown(key) local lkey = string.lower(key)
if lkey == 'q' then AbilityRemoteEvent:FireServer(lkey) elseif lkey == 'e' then AbilityRemoteEvent:FireServer(lkey) end end
local function onMouse1Down() if Tool.Enabled then Tool.Enabled = false wait(SWING_DEBOUNCE) Tool.Enabled = true end end
local function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) mouse.Button1Down:connect(onMouse1Down)
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer if player then local playerGui = player:FindFirstChild('PlayerGui') if playerGui then SoSGui.Parent = playerGui end end
if Tool.Parent then local character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if Humanoid then local equipAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(EquipAnim) if equipAnim then EquipSound:Play() equipAnim:Play(nil, nil, 1.5) end end end end end
local function onUnequipped() Tool.Enabled = true SoSGui.Parent = Tool end
AnimValue.Changed:connect(onAnimChanged) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local AbilityRemoteEvent = script:WaitForChild('AbilityRemoteEvent') local DebrisService = game:GetService('Debris') local AnimValue = Tool:WaitForChild('Anim') local IsGroundSwordDebounce = false local IsSpinAttackDebounce = false local IsAbilityInUse = false local IsSwinging = false local CanHit = false local ThisCharacter = nil local SoSGui = Tool:WaitForChild('SoSGui') local Frame = SoSGui:WaitForChild('Frame') local cdSmash = Frame:WaitForChild('cdSmash') local cdSpin = Frame:WaitForChild('cdSpin') local SlashSound = Handle:WaitForChild('SlashSound') local GroundSound = Handle:WaitForChild('GroundSound')
--------------------------------------------------- -- Constants -- --------------------------------------------------- -- Ground Swords local CONE_OUTTER_RADIUS = 50 local CONE_INNER_RADIUS = 10 local GROUND_SWORD_NUM = 100 local GROUND_SWORD_DURATION = 0.1 local GROUND_SWORD_END_POSITION = 5 local GROUND_SWORD_DMG = 20 local GROUND_SWORD_COOLDOWN = 5 -- Spin Attack local SPIN_ATTACK_COOLDOWN = 8 local SPIN_ATTACK_TIME = 2 local SPIN_SWORD_DMG = 15 -- General local SWORD_DMG = 30 local SWING_SPEED = 1.5 local SWING_DEBOUNCE = 0.9
local GroundSwordMeshes = { [1] = { ['meshId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=124121136', ['textureId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=124121617', ['scale'] = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) }, [2] = { ['meshId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68377852', ['textureId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68377863', ['scale'] = Vector3.new(1.2, 1.2, 1.2) }, [3] = { ['meshId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=103838505', ['textureId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=103838996', ['scale'] = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) }, }
local SpinSwordMeshes = { [1] = { ['meshId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11439778', ['textureId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11439794', }, [2] = { ['meshId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=73012411', ['textureId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=73012458' }, [3] = { ['meshId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=139126981', ['textureId'] = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=139127068' } }
--------------------------------------------------- -- Helper Functions -- --------------------------------------------------- local function getRandomPointInCircle() local x, z = 0, 0 while true do x = 2 * CONE_OUTTER_RADIUS * math.random() - CONE_OUTTER_RADIUS z = 2 * CONE_OUTTER_RADIUS * math.random() - CONE_OUTTER_RADIUS local magnitude = x * x + z * z if magnitude < CONE_OUTTER_RADIUS * 2 and magnitude > CONE_INNER_RADIUS * 2 then return Vector3.new(x, 0, z) end end end
local function lerp(t, start, finish, duration) t = t / duration return (1 - t) * start + t * finish end
local function clamp(val, low, high) if val < low then return low elseif val > high then return high end return val end
local function doCooldown(duration, cooldownGui) local t = 0 local deltaTime = tick() cooldownGui.Text = duration while t < duration do t = t + (tick() - deltaTime) cooldownGui.Text = string.format('%.1f', clamp(duration - t, 0, duration)) deltaTime = tick() wait() end cooldownGui.Text = '' end
local function guiFlash(cooldownGui) cooldownGui.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(236 * 0.004, 209 * 0.004, 53 * 0.004) local t = 0 local deltaTime = tick() while t < 0.2 do cooldownGui.BackgroundTransparency = lerp(t, 0.25, 1, 0.2) t = t + (tick() - deltaTime) deltaTime = tick() wait() end cooldownGui.BackgroundTransparency = 0.25 cooldownGui.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) end
--------------------------------------------------- -- Hit Events -- --------------------------------------------------- local function onSwordHit(hit) if IsSwinging or not CanHit then return end IsSwinging = true if hit.Parent then local hitCharacter = hit.Parent if hitCharacter == ThisCharacter then return end local hitHumanoid = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hitHumanoid then hitHumanoid:TakeDamage(SWORD_DMG) wait(SWING_DEBOUNCE) end end IsSwinging = false end
Handle.Touched:connect(onSwordHit)
local function onGroundSwordRegion(midPoint, ignoreModel) local regionHalfSize = Vector3.new(15, 2.5, 15) local startPoint = midPoint - regionHalfSize local endPoint = midPoint + regionHalfSize
local hitRegion = Region3.new(startPoint, endPoint)
local ignoreList = {ignoreModel, ThisCharacter} local partsInRegion = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList( hitRegion, ignoreList, 100 )
local hitHumanoids = {} for _,part in pairs(partsInRegion) do local isValidCharacter = true if part.Parent then local hitCharacter = part.Parent local hitHumanoid = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hitHumanoid then for _,hum in pairs(hitHumanoids) do if hum == hitHumanoid then isValidCharacter = false break end end if isValidCharacter then table.insert(hitHumanoids, hitHumanoid) end end end end
for _,hitHumanoid in pairs(hitHumanoids) do hitHumanoid:TakeDamage(GROUND_SWORD_DMG) local hitCharacter = hitHumanoid.Parent local hitTorso = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Torso') if hitTorso then hitTorso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 60, 0) end end end
--------------------------------------------------- -- Create Functions -- --------------------------------------------------- local function createGroundSword(spawnPoint, torsoPosition) local finalSpawnPoint = Vector3.new( spawnPoint.x + torsoPosition.x, torsoPosition.y - 5.5, spawnPoint.z + torsoPosition.z ) local sword = Instance.new('Part') sword.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom sword.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 5, 0.2) sword.Anchored = true sword.CanCollide = false sword.CFrame = CFrame.new(finalSpawnPoint + Vector3.new(0, 1.5, 0))
local randomMesh = math.random(1, #GroundSwordMeshes) local mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') mesh.Scale = GroundSwordMeshes[randomMesh]['scale'] mesh.MeshId = GroundSwordMeshes[randomMesh]['meshId'] mesh.TextureId = GroundSwordMeshes[randomMesh]['textureId'] mesh.Parent = sword
return sword end
local function createSpinSword(torso) local randomMesh = math.random(1, #SpinSwordMeshes) local sword = Instance.new('Part') sword.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom sword.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 5) sword.CanCollide = false sword.CFrame = CFrame.new(torso.Position + torso.CFrame.lookVector * 2) * (torso.CFrame - torso.CFrame.p) if randomMesh < 3 then sword.CFrame = sword.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) else sword.CFrame = sword.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, -math.pi * 0.5, math.pi * 0.5) end
local mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) mesh.MeshId = SpinSwordMeshes[randomMesh]['meshId'] mesh.TextureId = SpinSwordMeshes[randomMesh]['textureId'] mesh.Parent = sword
local hasHit = false sword.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hasHit then return end hasHit = true if hit.Parent then local hitCharacter = hit.Parent if hitCharacter == ThisCharacter then hasHit = false return end local hitHumanoid = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hitHumanoid and hitHumanoid.Health > 0 then print('spin sword hit', hitCharacter.Name) hitHumanoid:TakeDamage(SPIN_SWORD_DMG) wait(0.5) end end hasHit = false end)
local bodyVelocity = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bodyVelocity.velocity = torso.CFrame.lookVector * 50 bodyVelocity.Parent = sword
return sword end
--------------------------------------------------- -- Ability Helper Functions -- --------------------------------------------------- local function doJump(torso, humanoid) local bodyVelocity = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) * 1000000 bodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0) * 10 DebrisService:AddItem(bodyVelocity, 4) bodyVelocity.Parent = torso AnimValue.Value = 'UpSmashAnim'
Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) wait(0.35 * SWING_SPEED)
if bodyVelocity then bodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, -80, 0) end
wait(0.1 * SWING_SPEED)
if bodyVelocity then bodyVelocity:Destroy() bodyVelocity.Parent = nil end
wait(0.2) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) end
local function translateSwords(model, direction) local offset = 0 local t = 0 local deltaTime = tick() while t < GROUND_SWORD_DURATION do local d = lerp(t, 0, GROUND_SWORD_END_POSITION, GROUND_SWORD_DURATION) local step = d - offset offset = d model:TranslateBy(Vector3.new(0, step * direction, 0)) t = t + (tick() - deltaTime) deltaTime = tick() wait() end end
local function doGroundSwordEffect(swordsModel, regionMidPoint) GroundSound:Play() translateSwords(swordsModel, 1) onGroundSwordRegion(regionMidPoint, swordsModel) wait(0.25) translateSwords(swordsModel, -1) swordsModel:Destroy() swordsModel.Parent = nil end
local function shootBlades(torso) local t = 0 local deltaTime = tick() while t < SPIN_ATTACK_TIME do local sword = createSpinSword(torso) sword.Parent = game.Workspace DebrisService:AddItem(sword, 2)
t = t + (tick() - deltaTime) deltaTime = tick() wait() end end
--------------------------------------------------- -- Abilities -- --------------------------------------------------- local function ringOfSwords(character, humanoid) if IsGroundSwordDebounce then return end IsGroundSwordDebounce = true local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') if torso then IsAbilityInUse = true local spawnPosition = torso.Position doJump(torso, humanoid) local model = Instance.new('Model')
for i = 1, GROUND_SWORD_NUM do local sword = createGroundSword(getRandomPointInCircle(), spawnPosition) sword.Parent = model end model.Parent = game.Workspace doGroundSwordEffect(model, spawnPosition) IsAbilityInUse = false doCooldown(GROUND_SWORD_COOLDOWN, cdSmash) guiFlash(cdSmash) cdSmash.Text = 'Q' end IsGroundSwordDebounce = false end
local function spiningBladesAttack(character, humanoid) if IsSpinAttackDebounce then return end IsSpinAttackDebounce = true
local torso = character:FindFirstChild('Torso') if torso then IsAbilityInUse = true AnimValue.Value = 'SpinAnim'
local spinForce = Instance.new('BodyAngularVelocity') spinForce.P = 1000000 spinForce.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 20, 0) spinForce.maxTorque = Vector3.new(spinForce.P, spinForce.P, spinForce.P) spinForce.Parent = torso
Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0.5, 1) if SlashSound.IsPlaying then SlashSound:Stop() end SlashSound.Pitch = 1.1 SlashSound.Looped = true SlashSound:Play() shootBlades(torso) SlashSound:Stop() SlashSound.Pitch = 1 SlashSound.Looped = false
Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) spinForce:Destroy() spinForce.Parent = nil
IsAbilityInUse = false doCooldown(SPIN_ATTACK_COOLDOWN, cdSpin) guiFlash(cdSpin) cdSpin.Text = 'E' end IsSpinAttackDebounce = false end
--------------------------------------------------- -- Remote Events -- --------------------------------------------------- local function onServerEvent(player, key) if IsAbilityInUse then return end if player then if ThisCharacter then local humanoid = ThisCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then if key == 'q' then ringOfSwords(ThisCharacter, humanoid) elseif key == 'e' then spiningBladesAttack(ThisCharacter, humanoid) end end end end end
AbilityRemoteEvent.OnServerEvent:connect(onServerEvent)
--------------------------------------------------- -- Events -- --------------------------------------------------- local function onActivated() if CanHit or IsAbilityInUse then return end CanHit = true SlashSound:Play() AnimValue.Value = 'SwingAnim' wait(SWING_DEBOUNCE) CanHit = false end
local function onEquipped() ThisCharacter = Tool.Parent end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)

local SoSGui = script.Parent local Tool = SoSGui.Parent local SoSServerScript = Tool:WaitForChild('SoSScript') local AbilityRemoteEvent = SoSServerScript:WaitForChild('AbilityRemoteEvent') local Frame = SoSGui:WaitForChild('Frame') local BtnSmash = Frame:WaitForChild('BtnSmash') local BtnSpin = Frame:WaitForChild('BtnSpin') local cdSmash = Frame:WaitForChild('cdSmash') local cdSpin = Frame:WaitForChild('cdSpin')
local function onButtonSpin() AbilityRemoteEvent:FireServer('e') end
local function onButtonSmash() AbilityRemoteEvent:FireServer('q') end
BtnSpin.MouseButton1Click:connect(onButtonSpin) BtnSmash.MouseButton1Click:connect(onButtonSmash)
